      <tags>
        <tag>(2)</tag>

        <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="{\zeta}({\varphi},{s})=\sum_{{\omega}\in{{\bf Z}}^{n}\setminus\{0\}}{\varphi}(%&#10;{\omega})^{-{s}}," text="zeta * open-interval@(varphi, s) = (sum _ (omega element-of Z ^ n set-minus set@(0)))@(varphi * omega ^ (- s))" xml:id="S0.E2.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.E2.m1.5"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.E2.m1.5">
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.E2.m1.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.E2.m1.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E2.m1.2">φ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E2.m1.3">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN">ω</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="bold" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S0.E2.m1.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S0.E2.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.E2.m1.4"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="omega" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E2.m1.4">ω</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
            </XMWrap>
          </XMDual>
        </XMath>
      </Math>
    </equation>

                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex9.m1.4"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex9.m1.4">s</XMTok>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>

                </XMApp>

    </equation>

  <para xml:id="p20">
    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx2">
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq::PBaseEstimatesOne" xml:id="S0.E8">
        <tags>
          <tag>(8)</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">Equation 8</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">8</tag>
        </tags>
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle{t}\geq 1\ \Longrightarrow{c}_{1}{t}^{\gamma}{\left|\!\left|{x}%&#10;\right|\!\right|}\leq{\left|\!\left|{{t}^{A}{x}}\right|\!\right|}\leq{c}_{2}{t%&#10;}^{\beta}{\left|\!\left|{x}\right|\!\right|}," text="t &gt;= 1 *   Longrightarrow c _ 1 * t ^ gamma * norm@(x) less= norm@(t ^ A * x) less= c _ 2 * t ^ beta * norm@(x)" xml:id="S0.E8.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E8.m4.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.E8.m4.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN"> </XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="Longrightarrow" role="ARROW">⟹</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>

    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex15">
      <Math mode="display" tex="S_{L}\times[0,+\infty[\ni({\overline{x}},{t})\mapsto{x}={t}^{A}{\overline{x}}%&#10;\in{{\rm I\kern-1.85ptR}}^{n}\setminus\{0\}" xml:id="S0.Ex15.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMApp>
            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
          </XMApp>
          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
          <XMWrap>
            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
            <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="contains" name="ni" role="RELOP">∋</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex15.m1.1">
                  <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex15.m1.2">t</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">IR</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>

            </XMWrap>
          </XMWrap>
        </XMath>
      </Math>
    </equation>

  <para xml:id="p24">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex16">

  <para xml:id="p31">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex21">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\lim_{{x}\to+\infty}\frac{F({x})}{{x}^{a}}=\frac{R}{a}." text="(limit _ (x to + infinity))@((F * x) / x ^ a) = R / a" xml:id="S0.Ex21.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex21.m1.2"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex21.m1.2">
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
<!--  %**** String Line 200 **** -->                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="limit" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">lim</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMApp>

    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx5">
      <equation xml:id="S0.Ex24">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle{{\xi}_{{A}}\left({g},{s}\right)}=\int_{0}^{+\infty}{{\theta}_{{A%&#10;}}^{*}\left({{g}},{i{t}}\right)}{t}^{s}\frac{d{t}}{t}," text="xi _ A * open-interval@(g, s) = ((integral _ 0) ^ (+ infinity))@((theta _ A) ^ * * open-interval@(g, i * t) * t ^ s * ((d * t) / t))" xml:id="S0.Ex24.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S0.Ex24.m4.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex24.m4.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>

<!--  %**** String Line 250 **** -->  <para xml:id="p38">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex31">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{{x}\in{{\rm I\kern-1.85ptR}}^{n}}{\left|{{x}^{p}D^{q}{g}({x})}\right|}&lt;+\infty" text="(supremum _ (x element-of IR ^ n))@(absolute-value@(x ^ p * D ^ q * g * x)) less + infinity" xml:id="S0.Ex31.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
            <XMApp>
              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>

                              </XMDual>

      <Math mode="display" tex="{\left|{{g}({t}^{A}{x})}\right|}\leq\frac{{{\left|\!\left|{g}\right|\!\right|}%&#10;_{\sigma}}}{1+{\left|\!\left|{{t}^{A}{x}}\right|\!\right|}^{\sigma}}\leq\frac{%&#10;{{\left|\!\left|{g}\right|\!\right|}_{\sigma}}}{{\left|\!\left|{{t}^{A}{x}}%&#10;\right|\!\right|}^{\sigma}}." text="absolute-value@(g * t ^ A * x) less= (norm@(g)) _ sigma / (1 + (norm@(t ^ A * x)) ^ sigma) less= (norm@(g)) _ sigma / (norm@(t ^ A * x)) ^ sigma" xml:id="S0.Ex34.m1">

                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>

  <para xml:id="p46">
    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx9">
      <equation xml:id="S0.Ex36">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle{\left|{{{\xi}_{{A}}^{+}\left({g},{s}\right)}}\right|}\leq\int_{1%&#10;}^{+\infty}\left|{{\theta}_{{A}}^{*}\left({{g}},{{t}}\right)}{t}^{s}\right|%&#10;\frac{d{t}}{t}\leq{c}_{1}{{\left|\!\left|{g}\right|\!\right|}_{\sigma}}\int_{1%&#10;}^{+\infty}{t}^{{\mathop{\rm Re}\nolimits}{s}-{\gamma}{\sigma}}\frac{d{t}}{t}=%&#10;\frac{{c}_{1}{{\left|\!\left|{g}\right|\!\right|}_{\sigma}}}{{\gamma}{\sigma}-%&#10;{\mathop{\rm Re}\nolimits}{s}}" text="absolute-value@((xi _ A) ^ + * open-interval@(g, s)) less= ((integral _ 1) ^ (+ infinity))@(absolute-value@((theta _ A) ^ * * open-interval@(g, t) * t ^ s) * ((d * t) / t)) less= c _ 1 * (norm@(g)) _ sigma * ((integral _ 1) ^ (+ infinity))@(t ^ (Re@(s) - gamma * sigma) * ((d * t) / t)) = (c _ 1 * (norm@(g)) _ sigma) / (gamma * sigma - Re@(s))" xml:id="S0.Ex36.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex36.m4.7"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex36.m4.7">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post12"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post12"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S0.Ex36.m4.2"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S0.Ex36.m4.3"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex36.m4.2">g</XMTok>

  <para xml:id="p47">
    <equation xml:id="S0.E19">
      <tags>
        <tag>(19)</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">Equation 19</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">19</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="{{\xi}_{A}^{-}\left({g},{s}\right)}=-\frac{{g}(0)}{s}-\frac{\hat{g}(0)}{{%&#10;\alpha}-{s}}+{{\xi}_{{{\left.{{A}}\right.}^{t}}}^{+}\left({\hat{g}},{{\alpha}-%&#10;{s}}\right)}" text="(xi _ A) ^ - * open-interval@(g, s) = (- (g * 0) / s - (hat@(g) * 0) / (alpha - s)) + (xi _ (A ^ t)) ^ + * open-interval@(hat@(g), alpha - s)" xml:id="S0.E19.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S0.E19.m1.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S0.E19.m1.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E19.m1.3">g</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.E19.m1.4">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.E19.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S0.E19.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="hat" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">^</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.E19.m1.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S0.E19.m1.2">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

  <para xml:id="p51">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex41">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\int_{0}^{1}{{\theta}_{{{\left.{{A}}\right.}^{t}}}^{*}\left({\hat{g}},{\frac{i%&#10;}{t}}\right)}{t}^{{s}-{\alpha}}\frac{d{t}}{t}=\int_{1}^{+\infty}{{\theta}_{{{%&#10;\left.{{A}}\right.}^{t}}}^{*}\left({\hat{g}},{i{t}}\right)}{t}^{{\alpha}-{s}}%&#10;\frac{d{t}}{t}={{\xi}_{{{\left.{{A}}\right.}^{t}}}^{+}\left({\hat{g}},{{\alpha%&#10;}-{s}}\right)}." text="((integral _ 0) ^ 1)@((theta _ (A ^ t)) ^ * * open-interval@(hat@(g), i / t) * t ^ (s - alpha) * ((d * t) / t)) = ((integral _ 1) ^ (+ infinity))@((theta _ (A ^ t)) ^ * * open-interval@(hat@(g), i * t) * t ^ (alpha - s) * ((d * t) / t)) = (xi _ (A ^ t)) ^ + * open-interval@(hat@(g), alpha - s)" xml:id="S0.Ex41.m1">

      <Math mode="display" tex="{{\xi}_{{{\left.{{A}}\right.}^{t}}}\left({\hat{g}},{{\alpha}-{s}}\right)}=-%&#10;\frac{\tilde{g}(0)}{s}-\frac{\hat{g}(0)}{{\alpha}-{s}}+{{\xi}_{{A}}^{+}\left({%&#10;\tilde{g}},{s}\right)}+{{\xi}_{{{\left.{{A}}\right.}^{t}}}^{+}\left({\hat{g}},%&#10;{{\alpha}-{s}}\right)}," text="xi _ (A ^ t) * open-interval@(hat@(g), alpha - s) = (- (tilde@(g) * 0) / s - (hat@(g) * 0) / (alpha - s)) + (xi _ A) ^ + * open-interval@(tilde@(g), s) + (xi _ (A ^ t)) ^ + * open-interval@(hat@(g), alpha - s)" xml:id="S0.E24.m1">

  <para xml:id="p60">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eq::IntegralEquationBis" xml:id="S0.E25">
      <tags>
        <tag>(25)</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">Equation 25</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">25</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="{{\xi}_{{{\left.{{A}}\right.}^{t}}}\left({\hat{g}},{{\alpha}-{s}}\right)}=-%&#10;\frac{{g}(0)}{s}-\frac{\hat{g}(0)}{{\alpha}-{s}}+{{\xi}_{{A}}^{+}\left({g},{s}%&#10;\right)}+{{\xi}_{{{\left.{{A}}\right.}^{t}}}^{+}\left({\hat{g}},{{\alpha}-{s}}%&#10;\right)}." text="xi _ (A ^ t) * open-interval@(hat@(g), alpha - s) = (- (g * 0) / s - (hat@(g) * 0) / (alpha - s)) + (xi _ A) ^ + * open-interval@(g, s) + (xi _ (A ^ t)) ^ + * open-interval@(hat@(g), alpha - s)" xml:id="S0.E25.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.E25.m1.7"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.E25.m1.7">
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.E25.m1.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.E25.m1.7.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S0.E25.m1.3">
                        <XMTok name="hat" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">^</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S0.E25.m1.7.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>

  <para xml:id="p64">
    <equation labels="LABEL:prop::EulerEx::ToProve" xml:id="S0.E29">
      <tags>
        <tag>(29)</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">Equation 29</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">29</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="{D}_{{j}_{1}}\cdots{D}_{{j}_{k}}{f}({m}^{-1}{x})=\sum_{1\leq{i}_{1},\ldots,{i}%&#10;_{k}\leq{n}}{D}_{{i}_{1}}\cdots{D}_{{i}_{k}}{f}({x}){\lambda}\prod_{{l}=1}^{k}%&#10;{\lambda}_{{i}_{l}{j}_{l}}." text="D _ j _ 1 * cdots * D _ j _ k * f * m ^ (- 1) * x = (sum _ (formulae@(1 less= list@(i _ 1, ldots), i _ k less= n)))@(D _ i _ 1 * cdots * D _ i _ k * f * x * lambda * ((product _ (l = 1)) ^ k)@(lambda _ (i _ l * j _ l)))" xml:id="S0.E29.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.E29.m1.5"/>

    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex47">
      <Math mode="display" tex="{D}_{{j}_{1}}\cdots{D}_{{j}_{{k}-1}}{f}({m}^{-1}{x})=\sum_{1\leq{i}_{1},\ldots%&#10;,{i}_{{k}-1}\leq{n}}{D}_{{i}_{1}}\cdots{D}_{{i}_{{k}-1}}{f}({x}){\lambda}\prod%&#10;_{{l}=1}^{{k}-1}{\lambda}_{{i}_{l}{j}_{l}}." text="D _ j _ 1 * cdots * D _ j _ (k - 1) * f * m ^ (- 1) * x = (sum _ (formulae@(1 less= list@(i _ 1, ldots), i _ (k - 1) less= n)))@(D _ i _ 1 * cdots * D _ i _ (k - 1) * f * x * lambda * ((product _ (l = 1)) ^ (k - 1))@(lambda _ (i _ l * j _ l)))" xml:id="S0.Ex47.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex47.m1.5"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex47.m1.5">

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="cdots" role="ID">⋯</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex47.m1.2">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>

  <para xml:id="p67">
    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx12">
      <equation xml:id="S0.Ex51">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle{D}_{{j}_{1}}\cdots{D}_{{j}_{k}}{f}({m}^{-1}{x})={D}_{{j}_{k}}%&#10;\left({D}_{{j}_{1}}\cdots{D}_{{j}_{{k}-1}}{f}\right)({m}^{-1}{x})=\sum_{{i}_{k%&#10;}=1}^{n}{D}_{{i}_{k}}\left({D}_{{j}_{1}}\cdots{D}_{{j}_{{k}-1}}{f}({m}^{-1}{x}%&#10;)\right){\lambda}_{{i}_{k}{j}_{k}}=\sum_{{i}_{k}=1}^{n}{D}_{{i}_{k}}\left(\sum%&#10;_{1\leq{i}_{1},\ldots,{i}_{{k}-1}\leq{n}}{D}_{{i}_{1}}\cdots{D}_{{i}_{{k}-1}}{%&#10;f}({x}){\lambda}\prod_{{l}=1}^{{k}-1}{\lambda}_{{i}_{l}{j}_{l}}\right){\lambda%&#10;}_{{i}_{k}{j}_{k}}=\sum_{1\leq{i}_{1},\ldots,{i}_{k}\leq{n}}{D}_{{i}_{1}}%&#10;\cdots{D}_{{i}_{k}}{f}({x}){\lambda}\prod_{{l}=1}^{k}{\lambda}_{{i}_{l}{j}_{l}}," text="D _ j _ 1 * cdots * D _ j _ k * f * m ^ (- 1) * x = D _ j _ k * D _ j _ 1 * cdots * D _ j _ (k - 1) * f * m ^ (- 1) * x = ((sum _ (i _ k = 1)) ^ n)@(D _ i _ k * D _ j _ 1 * cdots * D _ j _ (k - 1) * f * m ^ (- 1) * x * lambda _ (i _ k * j _ k)) = ((sum _ (i _ k = 1)) ^ n)@(D _ i _ k * (sum _ (formulae@(1 less= list@(i _ 1, ldots), i _ (k - 1) less= n)))@(D _ i _ 1 * cdots * D _ i _ (k - 1) * f * x * lambda * ((product _ (l = 1)) ^ (k - 1))@(lambda _ (i _ l * j _ l))) * lambda _ (i _ k * j _ k)) = (sum _ (formulae@(1 less= list@(i _ 1, ldots), i _ k less= n)))@(D _ i _ 1 * cdots * D _ i _ k * f * x * lambda * ((product _ (l = 1)) ^ k)@(lambda _ (i _ l * j _ l)))" xml:id="S0.Ex51.m4">

  <para xml:id="p72">
    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx14">
      <equation xml:id="S0.Ex56">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle{D}_{{j}_{1}}\cdots{D}_{{j}_{k}}{\varphi}({x})={D}_{{j}_{1}}%&#10;\cdots{D}_{{j}_{k}}{\varphi}({t}^{A}{\overline{x}})=\sum_{1\leq{i}_{1},\ldots,%&#10;{i}_{k}\leq{n}}{D}_{{i}_{1}}\cdots{D}_{{i}_{k}}{\varphi}({\overline{x}}){t}%&#10;\prod_{{l}=1}^{k}{\left&lt;{{e}_{{j}_{l}}},{{t}^{-{A}}{e}_{{i}_{l}}}\right&gt;}," text="D _ j _ 1 * cdots * D _ j _ k * varphi * x = D _ j _ 1 * cdots * D _ j _ k * varphi * t ^ A * overline@(x) = (sum _ (formulae@(1 less= list@(i _ 1, ldots), i _ k less= n)))@(D _ i _ 1 * cdots * D _ i _ k * varphi * overline@(x) * t * ((product _ (l = 1)) ^ k)@(list@(e _ j _ l, t ^ (- A) * e _ i _ l)))" xml:id="S0.Ex56.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S0.Ex56.m4.6"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex56.m4.6">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="cdots" role="ID">⋯</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex56.m4.4"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex56.m4.4">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>

  <para xml:id="p73">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex57">
      <Math mode="display" tex="{\left|{{D}_{{j}_{1}}\cdots{D}_{{j}_{k}}{\varphi}({x})}\right|}\leq{c}_{4}\,{t%&#10;}\prod_{{l}=1}^{k}{\left|\!\left|{{t}^{-{A}}{e}_{l}}\right|\!\right|}\leq{c}_{%&#10;5}\,{t}^{1-{\beta}{k}}\leq{c}_{6}\,{\left|\!\left|{x}\right|\!\right|}^{\frac{%&#10;1}{\beta}(1-{\beta}{k})}={c}_{6}\,{\left|\!\left|{x}\right|\!\right|}^{\frac{1%&#10;}{\beta}-{k}}." text="absolute-value@(D _ j _ 1 * cdots * D _ j _ k * varphi * x) less= c _ 4 * t * ((product _ (l = 1)) ^ k)@(norm@(t ^ (- A) * e _ l)) less= c _ 5 * t ^ (1 - beta * k) less= c _ 6 * (norm@(x)) ^ ((1 / beta) * (1 - beta * k)) = c _ 6 * (norm@(x)) ^ (1 / beta - k)" xml:id="S0.Ex57.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex57.m1.5"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex57.m1.5">
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex57.m1.5.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="true">|</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex57.m1.5.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>

            </XMWrap>
          </XMDual>
        </XMath>
      </Math>
    </equation>
  </para>

    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx23">
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq::abcZeta::A" xml:id="S0.E36">
        <tags>
          <tag>(36)</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">Equation 36</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">36</tag>
        </tags>
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle{g}=e^{-{\varphi}},\ {\mathop{\rm Re}\nolimits}{s}&gt;{\beta}{n}%&#10;\Longrightarrow\ {{\xi}_{{A}}\left({g},{s}\right)}=\Gamma({s}){\zeta}({\varphi%&#10;},{s})," text="formulae@(g = e ^ (- varphi), Re@(s) &gt; beta * n Longrightarrow   * xi _ A * open-interval@(g, s) = Gamma * s * zeta * open-interval@(varphi, s))" xml:id="S0.E36.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E36.m4.6"/>

              <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle{g}=e^{-{\varphi}},\ {\mathop{\rm Re}\nolimits}{s}&gt;{\beta}{n}" text="formulae@(g = e ^ (- varphi), Re@(s) &gt; beta * n)" xml:id="S0.E36.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.E36.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.E36.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S0.E36.m1.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>

                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="5.0pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S0.E36.m1.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="BIGOP">Re</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

      <Math mode="display" tex="\int_{{{\rm I\kern-1.85ptR}}^{n}}e^{-a{\varphi}({x})}d{x}=a^{-{\alpha}}\Gamma(%&#10;{\alpha}+1)|{B}_{\varphi}|" text="(integral _ (IR ^ n))@(e ^ (- a * varphi * x) * differential-d@(x)) = a ^ (- alpha) * Gamma * (alpha + 1) * absolute-value@(B _ varphi)" xml:id="S0.E40.m1">

            <tr>
              <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\int_{{{\rm I\kern-1.85ptR}}^{n}}e^{-a{\varphi}({x})}d{x}" text="(integral _ (IR ^ n))@(e ^ (- a * varphi * x) * differential-d@(x))" xml:id="S0.Ex92.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">IR</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>

                          </XMWrap>

  <para xml:id="p124">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex108">
      <Math mode="display" tex="{\zeta}({\varphi},{s})=\int_{0}^{+\infty}{t}^{-{s}}d\mu_{\varphi}({t})." text="zeta * open-interval@(varphi, s) = ((integral _ 0) ^ (+ infinity))@(t ^ (- s) * differential-d@(mu _ varphi) * t)" xml:id="S0.Ex108.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex108.m1.4"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex108.m1.4">
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.Ex108.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.Ex108.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex108.m1.1">φ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex108.m1.2">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>

      <equation xml:id="S0.Ex115">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle\leq{\alpha}|{B}_{{\psi}_{1}}|\leq(1-{\varepsilon})^{-{n}}{\alpha%&#10;}|{B}_{\varphi}|" text="absent less= alpha * absolute-value@(B _ psi _ 1) less= (1 - varepsilon) ^ (- n) * alpha * absolute-value@(B _ varphi)" xml:id="S0.Ex115.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>

                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMCell>

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex120.m1.6"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex120.m1.6">
                            <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="S0.EGx30">
      <equation xml:id="S0.Ex124">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle\lim_{{\nu}\to+\infty}{\psi}_{\nu}({x})={\varphi}_{1}({x})\geq{%&#10;\varphi}({x})." text="(limit _ (nu to + infinity))@(psi _ nu * x) = varphi _ 1 * x &gt;= varphi * x" xml:id="S0.Ex124.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S0.Ex124.m4.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex124.m4.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid8"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="limit" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">lim</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>

                          <XMRef idref="S0.Ex124.m4.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex124.m4.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex124.m4.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex124.m4.2">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex124.m4.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>

              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
          <MathBranch>

  <para xml:id="p140">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex131">
      <Math mode="display" tex="{M}_{\nu}=\sup_{|{s}-{\alpha}|=\delta}\left|{\zeta}({\psi}_{\nu},{s})\right|." text="M _ nu = (supremum _ (absolute-value@(s - alpha) = delta))@(absolute-value@(zeta * open-interval@(psi _ nu, s)))" xml:id="S0.Ex131.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex131.m1.3"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex131.m1.3">
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>

<!--  %**** String Line 1050 **** -->  <para xml:id="p147">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eq::proof::ZetaConvergence" xml:id="S0.E48">
      <tags>
        <tag>(48)</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">Equation 48</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">48</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\lim_{{\nu}\to+\infty}{\zeta}({\psi}_{\nu},{s})=f({s})" text="(limit _ (nu to + infinity))@(zeta * open-interval@(psi _ nu, s)) = f * s" xml:id="S0.E48.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
            <XMApp>
              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="limit" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">lim</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>

          <MathBranch>
            <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle{\left|{{\zeta}({\varphi},{s})}\right|}\leq{c}_{1}e^{{\varepsilon%&#10;}{\mathop{\rm Im}\nolimits}{s}}," text="absolute-value@(zeta * open-interval@(varphi, s)) less= c _ 1 * e ^ (varepsilon * Im@(s))" xml:id="S0.E49.m3">

                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.E49.m3.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S0.E49.m3.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S0.E49.m3.3.1"/>

  <para xml:id="p156">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex142">
      <Math mode="display" tex="{{\xi}_{{m}^{-1}{A}}\left({g},{\frac{s}{m}}\right)}=-\frac{m}{s}-\frac{{m}\hat%&#10;{g}_{m}(0)}{{\alpha}-{s}}+{{\xi}_{{m}^{-1}{A}}^{+}\left({{g}_{m}},{\frac{s}{m}%&#10;}\right)}+{{\xi}_{{m}^{-1}{{\left.{{A}}\right.}^{t}}}^{+}\left({\hat{g}_{m}},{%&#10;\frac{{\alpha}-{s}}{m}}\right)}." text="xi _ (m ^ (- 1) * A) * open-interval@(g, s / m) = (- m / s - (m * (hat@(g)) _ m * 0) / (alpha - s)) + (xi _ (m ^ (- 1) * A)) ^ + * open-interval@(g _ m, s / m) + (xi _ (m ^ (- 1) * A ^ t)) ^ + * open-interval@((hat@(g)) _ m, (alpha - s) / m)" xml:id="S0.Ex142.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex142.m1.6"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex142.m1.6">

    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex153">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\partial{{{R}({T})}}}{w}^{-{s}}\Gamma({s}){\zeta}({%&#10;\varphi},{s})d{s}=\Gamma({\alpha}+1){\left|{{B}_{\varphi}}\right|}{w}^{-{%&#10;\alpha}}-1+\sum_{{k}=1}^{N}\frac{(-1)^{k}{\zeta}({\varphi},-{k})}{{k}!}{w}^{k}." text="(1 / (2 * pi * i)) * (integral _ (partial-differential@(R) * T))@(w ^ (- s) * Gamma * s * zeta * open-interval@(varphi, s) * differential-d@(s)) = (Gamma * (alpha + 1) * absolute-value@(B _ varphi) * w ^ (- alpha) - 1) + ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ N)@((((- 1) ^ k * zeta * open-interval@(varphi, - k)) / kfactorial) * w ^ k)" xml:id="S0.Ex153.m1">

                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex153.m1.5"/>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
            </XMWrap>
          </XMDual>
        </XMath>
      </Math>
    </equation>
  </para>
